data.text: I've had this rust form on the surface hours after cleaning. 1) don't freak out. 2) lube it, then 3) ride. I use Shimano chains. Follow the directions for the lube you use. I use Dumonde Tech Original. I usually use a Park chain scrubber with degreaser of some sort, and scrub the chain while it's on the bike. Then hose it down lightly with water. I then take the bike off the stand and bounce it a few times to shake off most of the water. I'll use a rag and/or shop paper towels. I'll also wait maybe an hour. We have triple degree temps around here, it doesn't take long to dry.
